roleset.name: incorporate into popular culture (action)
roleset.note: MAINSTREAM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mainstream' based on sentences in ECTB. No Verbnet entry. Frame created by Jena. Adjectival 'mainstream' found in BOLT-7. (from mainstream.01-v)

example.name: mainstream-v
example.text: We-2 got *PRO*-2 to mainstream them and because ...

roleset.name: popularly accepted (state)
roleset.note: MAINSTREAM-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from mainstream.01-j)

example.name: mainstream-j
example.text: How many hearts are pained due to these moral decreases and lack of social concerns -- but these really exist and are like weeds in farmland ; they are not mainstream , but bring too much negative influence to the healthly growth of seedlings ; based on such events , now is a good time to learn about Lei Feng 's spirit .
